infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires access to the photo library for admin to upload images of items to the app.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires access to the camera for admin to take photos of itmes to put in the app.

NSPrivacyAccessedAPITypes.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryFileTimestam: Used for organizing the timestamps of images or files when they are uploaded to ensure they are displayed in the correct order.
NSPrivacyAccessedAPITypes.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryDiskSpace: Used to check available disk space to ensure there is sufficient space before saving images locally.
NSPrivacyAccessedAPITypes.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategorySystemBootTi: Used to record app usage statistics that help optimize app performance. No personal data is collected.
NSPrivacyAccessedAPITypes.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryUserDefaults: Used to save user settings within the app, enhancing the user experience by remembering your preferences across sessions.
